sentences.english: Mary dabbed at the stain on her skirt.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽轻拭裙子上的污迹。

sentences.english: Clean any oil stains off the underbody panelling.
sentences.chinese: 清除车底饰板上的任何机油污迹。

sentences.english: Clean your finger, before you point my spots .
sentences.chinese: 先洗净你的手指再指出我的污迹。

sentences.english: Did you get the stain out of your skirt?
sentences.chinese: 你裙子上的污迹弄掉了吗？

sentences.english: If the stain is still very evident, it would take to a layer of primer.
sentences.chinese: 如果污迹依然很明显，则需再上一层底涂。

sentences.english: There's a nasty mark on the tablecloth , and I don't think the usual washing powder will take it out.
sentences.chinese: 桌布上有一块污迹，我想用普通洗衣粉是洗不掉的。

sentences.english: You’re less likely to see stains if you throw some darker sheets on before you get started.
sentences.chinese: 在你开始之前用一些黑色的床单会使你很少看到污迹。

sentences.english: No one wants to see your stained napkin.
sentences.chinese: 没人愿意看到你那带了污迹的餐巾。

sentences.english: You'll have to scrub hard to get that stain out.
sentences.chinese: 你得用力擦，才能把那块污迹去掉。

sentences.english: If smear is too heavy, usable scour efface, again dry finally brush.
sentences.chinese: 假如污迹太重，可用洗涤剂抹去，最后再干擦一遍。

sentences.english: He vainly tried to mark the defacing stain out.
sentences.chinese: 他试图除去有损外观的污迹，但没有成功。

sentences.english: If the stain cannot be removed, spray general purpose cleaner on the spot and dab with a dry cleaning cloth.
sentences.chinese: 如果污迹不能被清楚，使用清洁剂，并用干布轻擦。

sentences.english: Water stains were seen on the ceiling around the intakes and near skylights.
sentences.chinese: 在入口周围和天窗附近可以看到水的污迹。

sentences.english: My cap had gone awry, my apron was stained, my feet ached.
sentences.chinese: 我的帽子歪了，围裙上污迹斑斑，两脚疼痛难忍。

sentences.english: I rubbed hard but the stain just wouldn't go.
sentences.chinese: 我使劲擦也擦不掉那污迹。

sentences.english: A number of stains on the wall were papered over.
sentences.chinese: 墙上许多污迹已用纸遮盖了起来。

definition: water spot/water stain/wet spot/damp patch/water damage
to clean (with water or alcohol)/to wipe and wash/to swab/to scrub
